original_text: He also brought the grain offering, took a handful of it and burned it on the altar in addition to the morning’s burnt offering.
korean_text: 또 소제를 드리되 그 중에서 그의 손에 한 움큼을 채워서 아침 번제물에 더하여 제단 위에서 불사르고

sentences.original_text: He also brought the grain offering
and burned it on the altar
in addition to the morning's burnt offering
